revised_title: Experiments on Staining and Painting of Marble
tldr: This article discusses experiments conducted on various pieces of marble stained by Mr. Robert Chambers. The author, Emanuel Mendez da Costa, explores the historical methods of staining marble and tests the colorfastness of the stains using various chemicals and processes. The results suggest that Chambers' method of staining marble is effective and could have practical applications in art and architecture.
